nodes.text: Benar were a pair of Modular conveyors belonging to the Imperials. Benar group were part of the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Corrupter's vital resupply convoy lead by the Nebulon-B Frigate Monitor to the Corrupter in the Mev system. Both of their cargoes were 'provisions'. The ships were then attacked by Rebel raiders and was destroyed.
